data.name: Little Busters! - Kud Wafter Theme Song Single "one's future"
data.detailed_description:
Wafu~! As part of our celebration of the 10th anniversary of Little Busters! and the successful funding of the Kud Wafter anime international crowdfunding project, the opening theme song of Kud Wafter, "one's future", is now available on Steam!

This theme song DLC is a digital version of the original 2010 single "one's future" (KSLA-0056), and features 5 tracks in both FLAC and MP3 formats.

Track list

1. one's future

2. one's future -Let's Go Kud! ver.-
3. one's future -Off Vocal instrumental-
4. one's future -Off Vocal+chorus instrumental-
5. adagio for summer wind

Note: The included booklet is available only in Japanese.
